title: Marketing wool (Wool marketing in the 1950s)
creator_credit: Australian Wool Corporation and Frank Land
brief_description: Shows the various phases in handling wool from the time it is pressed into bales at the shearing shed until it is dispatched overseas. The wool auction system is illustrated and the point made that wool growers do not have any control over the price their wool brings at auction.
description: Shows the various phases in handling wool from the time it is pressed into bales at the shearing shed until it is dispatched overseas. The wool auction system is illustrated and the point made that wool growers do not have any control over the price their wool brings at auction.

The wool auction system is illustrated and the point made that wool growers do not have any control over the price their wool brings at auction.
